dcterms:description: A dataset containing messages from Twitter in English and Spanish, labeled for hate speech detection. The English part consists of 10,000 messages with 42.1% labeled as hate speech, and the Spanish part consists of 4,969 messages with 41.5% labeled as hate speech.
dcterms:title: SemEval-2019 Task 5 Dataset
